overview: A Documentary about Houshang Moradi Kermani (Persian: هوشنگ مرادی کرمانی; born 7 September 1944 in Sirch, a village in Kerman Province, Iran). Moradi Kermani is an Iranian writer best known for children's and young adult fiction. He was a finalist in 2014 for the Hans Christian Andersen Award.
title: Stories
